archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0590
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to update the payment method for my interest free payment agreement, so I can ensure it does not default

properties.value: The card should be assigned per service? similar to REQ_BSS_0162 Card should relate to particular servie, e.g. one card for interest free the other card for subscription Parked for customer hierarchy workshop

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
